title.rendered: VALENTINE’S DAY – I LOVE PINK TREND

content.rendered:
VALENTINE’S DAY – I LOVE PINK TREND

Happy February! There is so much to celebrate in February…Valentine’s Day, President’s Day, and it starts to feel like Spring is just around the corner. I love pink because I feel like it brightens up my mood and gives me a little bit of burst of energy in my step. With so many different shades of pink, it’s fun to play around with this trend. You can incorporate this color with your accessories or wear a bold pink coat that’s on trend at the moment. It’s just such a happy beautiful color.

1: Both looks and earrings are from FWRD.COM 2: Get beautiful A-list lashes for Valentine’s Day and for the long weekend – President’s Day with D’Lashes! Lash Extensions Appointment Click Here (By Appointment). 3: Shop D’Lashes Beauty Here. – The perfect fresh pink lipgloss with natural looking individual lashes from D’Lashes.com! 4: Top cream bag with gold stars is YSL. 

Happy LOVE month!

LOVE DIONNE
